about.content: With more than 10 years of experience in the industry, I have worked in advertising agencies and companies for various brands and sectors in Argentina, Spain and Ireland. From low-budget business to companies positioned in the market, I made it grow each business efficiently, positioning the brand and building consumer loyalty. I’m a passionate professional who added value to each project. Let’s start!

services.intro: Do you want to launch your brand, position yourself in the market or increase your sales?
services.description: Learn about all the tools and consult the one suitable for your business.
services.serviceDescription1: Writings not for everyone, simplify your concepts and communicate them in a simple and concise way.
services.serviceDescription2: May your projects arrive on time and with the right team and the result you are looking for.
services.serviceDescription3: It's time to set objectives, times and costs. What is not communicated is not sold!
services.serviceDescription4: Let's start from the beginning! Who we are, what we look like, who our audience is and how we are going to talk to them.
services.serviceDescription5: If a commercial or audiovisual project needs a structure, let's get to work.
services.serviceDescription6: Why would you follow a brand? That is the first question to stand out from the average.
services.serviceDescription7: To position, you have to write! Technical texts on websites are key to positioning yourself on Google.

testimonial1.name: Ana
testimonial1.content: It was a pleasure working with Carli. Besides being a great person, she is a great professional. She carried out each challenge with dedication and responsibility, always attentive to the smallest detail. I highlight her creativity and positive energy for work. Her contributions were always accurate and were key to the success of many advertising campaigns.

testimonial2.name: Lucía
testimonial2.content: Working with Carli is a great pleasure. She is a highly creative person who approaches projects with the best attitude, understanding and resolving the client's requests and needs. On a personal level, she is always willing to help and brings the best energy.

testimonial3.name: Facundo
testimonial3.content: Working with Carla means working with someone who loves what she does. Always willing to work as a team, contributing creativity, organization, and commitment, with energy that is contagious. I hope we can work together again soon!

testimonial4.name: Brenda
testimonial4.content: We worked together and I can assure you that she is a great professional. Responsible, a good teammate, problem solver, and above all, passionate about what she does. All this makes it a pleasure to work with her.

book.title: Writing is my passion, in all its formats.
book.content: My next book will be released very soon. Ready?
